root: ^"I've seen the report about your last examination."
^"Let me tell you the clue I have in mind -- based on your previous results, it seems that something is wrong with your pelvis."

^"As far as I can tell, some displacement due to the intensity and long period you always sit and work has happened around your sacrum and vertebra, which further leads to a stress that is constantly... sort of extruding  your spine. "
^"Well, all I know for sure is that your spine structre suffers from a constant tension, so does your spinal cord inside it."
^"At best, it would lead to pain, tiredness, a powerlessness in your bodymuscle, and maybe some dizzyness."
^"A cancer due to heavy hyperplasia around this area is also not completely impossible."
^"Luckily, though--an easy surgery could remedy all of these."
^"A little operation to adjust around your waist, and you will be as good as new."
^"You mean... a surgery? By cutting off something from me?"
^"Well, it's really not a big deal. As I said, the surgery will be easy and little."
^"With a set of state-of-the-art equipment--which we happen to have here--I can even do it right here and right now."
^"It only takes no more than 30 minutes to complete. After that, lying down and resting for one night makes everything fine."
^"Actually, I strongly recommment you to do that."
^"F-Fine. I mean, as long as you guarantee it's fast. And safe."
^"I have to work tomorrow so it's better not to stay until too late."
^"If you are all good, I'm going to prepare all the things needed."
^"You know, contracts, disinfection, that sort of things."
